attributes.action: To make Bruce Forsyth a knight
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: He has for years given countless people the benefit of his talent. Also he works tirelessly for charity.This country has given a knighthood to people that are not British, we need to honour our own as well.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
